front.title: Pointers for Peer-to-Peer Overlay Networks, Nodes, or Resources

abstract.t: Identifying overlay networks and the resources found within in them presents a number of bootstrapping problems. While those hard problems are under discussion, this draft proposes a small set of URI-based mechanisms which are intended to be generically useful for providing pointers to peer-to-peer overlay networks in web pages, email messages, and other textual media.
